title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 25.1 - Emergency required for suspension of rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 25.1 - Emergency required for suspension of rules

State Regulations

This Article may be suspended in whole or in part, in an
emergency, for the duration of same and to an extent made necessary by the
nature of the emergency, on approval by the State Civil Service Commission of a
written request by the appointing authority in the agency in which the
emergency exists. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
25.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
